branches.key_insight: Highest confidence from systematic exploration of 8 approaches

branches.conclusion: Event-driven architecture with Kafka event sourcing
branches.key_insight: Stock exchange analogy validates event sourcing pattern

complementary_insights.at: Event sourcing pattern from trading analogy

agreement_analysis.rationale: Both analytical (BoT) and analogical (AT) reasoning converged on Kafka event-driven architecture

merged_result.conclusion: Kafka + Flink event-driven architecture with event sourcing
merged_result.synthesis: BoT identified Kafka + Flink as top approach through systematic exploration. AT validated this through stock exchange analogy, adding event sourcing pattern insight. Merged solution combines Flink stream processing with event sourcing pattern for audit trail and replay capability.

next_step.rationale: High-confidence merged solution should be validated against adversarial scenarios
